channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15674] HRegionLocator#getAllRegionLocations should put the results in cache
item.description: getAllRegionLocations walks meta. Well after doing the work, we should put the results into cache.
item.summary: HRegionLocator#getAllRegionLocations should put the results in cache

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: upload a simple patch.
